full_threads.body:
@rica Sorry for the delay. Regarding task 4, the current staging design does not match the rest of Dr Sushil's website. 

I have attached a very basic layout suggestion. Alternatively we can use some styling hints from from the https://quakershillsolar.com.au/solar-system-installs/ listings are displayed. 
Can I please ask for the following: 
1. The listings to be changed to show a 2 x 2 configuration as per attached (to allow images to be larger)
2. Remove the blue box around listing
3. Add 'read more' button 

Perhaps Jaime or Glen can assist with this task?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Active

I'll let you know once done.
